revisionDesc.change: removed spaces surrounding em-dashes and inserted space between initials
checked file for values of @facs, further revised header information, revised encoding
changes to TEI header, including punctuation of titles and replacing initials with full names when possible

body.ab: Auditor for the P. O. Department

I have the honor to acknowledge the receipt of your letter of July 29th last, relating to the suit of the United States vs. Keehler, et al., and to say that it has been argued and decided by the Supreme Court in favor of the United States; and the opinion of the Court can be obtained by you from the Clerk of the Court.
body.note: suit of Keehler ag't. U. S. in Sup. Ct.
